sections.purpose: To perform rapid filtration of pharmaceutical solutions under vacuum.
sections.scope: Applicable to sample purification in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Assemble the filtration unit on the collection flask.
Place the filter membrane on the support using tweezers.
Attach the funnel and connect to the vacuum source.
Switch ON the vacuum pump and pour the liquid into the funnel.
After filtration, release the vacuum first, then turn OFF the pump.
Retrieve the filtrate or the filter as needed.
Clean the unit thoroughly after each use.
precautions: Ensure the membrane is compatible with the solvent.
Check for leaks in the vacuum tubing regularly.
Avoid overflow into the vacuum line.
Handle the assembly carefully to avoid breakage.
